name: Grab The Goblins!
description:
Context:

Goblins have snuck into our world from all sorts of books, movies, and games! Grab them all before they get up to too many shenanigans! This game is short and cozy.

Features:

  • 🎨 4 Hand drawn stages with unique artsyles and sizes!
  • 🤏 250+ Unique goblins to grab!
  • 🎶 Custom Soundtrack for each stage!
  • 🔍Handy hint button!
  • ⏱️ Time trial mode for each stage!
  • 👄 Mouth made SFX!

Controls:

  • Left click to grab a goblin
  • Right click and move the mouse to pan (on the larger stages)
  • 'Spacebar' to point to the nearest goblin
